linguaggio.sottotitolo: "The site to mark the anime you have yet to see"
linguaggio.consiglioLogin: Log in securely to our application
linguaggio.descrizioneListaAnime: Here you can view the list of anime you have in your profile, by right clicking on the set line you can remove the following anime from your list. If you want to add a new one, just go to the "Add anime" page.
linguaggio.descrizioneAggiungiAnime: Here you can add the anime you want to watch to your personal list
linguaggio.notificaListaVuota: Your anime list is empty, please add some!
linguaggio.notificaRicercaAnimeVuota: There is no such anime in our database
linguaggio.notificaInserimentoCorretto: The anime has been entered successfully
linguaggio.notificaAnimeGiaInLista: The anime is already in your list
linguaggio.errorePopolamento: First you need to populate the database
linguaggio.erroreNomeAnimeMancanteNellaRicerca: You must insert the name of anime that you want to search, or part of this
linguaggio.erroreNessunAnimeSelezionato: No anime has been selected from the table
linguaggio.erroreParametriClient: The parameters passed in the request are not just valid
linguaggio.erroreTrailerNonDisponibile: The trailer of the following anime is not available on our service
linguaggio.erroreAperturaTrailerSONonSupportato: We apologize, the trailer cannot be opened on your operating system
linguaggio.erroreDigitaCampiRegistrazione: You still need to complete some fields
linguaggio.errorePasswordNonCoincidenti: The two password are not the same
linguaggio.erroreAccessoPagina: You must log in before accessing this section
linguaggio.erroreServerIrraggiungibile: Is been detect an server problem
linguaggio.erroreGenerico: The application has encountered an error
